job_title: Strategic Sourcing Manager in Saint Louis, MO
pros: Great work/life balance; leadership is concerned about employees as a whole, not just what they can contribute to the company
cons: Healthcare industry has its ups and downs on schedules; the professional suite and tie attire seems a little outdated

review_title: Dynamic Ahead of the Curve GPO
pros: Ahead of the curve, invests heavily in associates, fantastic processes and procedures
